content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Of course, I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what kind of room you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
20 square meters, preferably 25.

What is the monthly rental price?
name: Max Müller

content: I apologize, but I don't have the information about the monthly rental price of the apartment at this time. Can you please provide me with more details about your requirements and budget for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center. My budget is 1000 Euros per month.

I am interested in this apartment, can you please provide me with the monthly rental price?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on your requirements and budget, I would like to propose a monthly rental price of 1200 Euros. This price includes utilities and all other expenses associated with the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
